reviews.name: The Pacific (Widescreen)
reviews.reviewText: Good story nice production good acting. Anyone who is interested in WWII this is a must have. Particularly good because it tells the story of real people.
reviews.title: 16 November 2010

reviews.name: The Pacific (Widescreen)
reviews.reviewText: Shown in stunning detail what our Fathers went through but never speak of. My only complaint would be that it seemed a little rushed. When I viewed Band of B's I was closer to the main characters, a richer character developement maybe. Wish it was longer, in a nutshell.
reviews.title: Very Good but its no "Band of Brothers"

reviews.name: The Pacific (Widescreen)
reviews.reviewText: Unbelievable movie. It certainly give you a wonderful perspective of the sacrifices that our fathers made during WW2. Very moving.
reviews.title: The Pacific DVD

reviews.name: The Pacific (Widescreen)
reviews.reviewText: I enjoy playing military simulations, while watching movies or documentaries pertaining to that theatre. While engaged with "Company of Heroes" I was able to watch the corresponding " Band of Brothers". Now that I am currently involved in the Pacific with "Pacific War" the mini series "Pacific was made to order. I would reccoment this product to all persons of similair interests.
reviews.title: great product

reviews.name: The Pacific (Widescreen)
reviews.reviewText: A lot of strong laungage, but that is the reality of war. Would recommend it for adults or mature kids in last years of high school. Way too much reality for anyone younger. Recommend watching the 6th disc first with profiles of the different people portrayed in the series. Also on each disc you can choose to watch it with historical background.
reviews.title: 01 January 2011
